desc: Flash Design Company designs and manufactures costumes for competitive dancers. We also provide many studios with custom costuming for their recreational programs. All of our team members are industry professionals, having worked with numerous reputable dance studios, and in film, television and theatre productions.

layout.text: Flash Design Co. Stage Wear provides timeless, unique and on-trend costumes that are creatively designed. We offer ready to wear dance costumes for all dance genres including ballet, lyrical, tap, jazz, hip-hop. Available in a range of sizes, colours and themes, there is a costume for every choreographic piece.
